lead_paragraph: Antonio Di Natale scored twice and Mauro Camoranesi had a goal to lead host Italy, the World Cup champion, over Belgium, 3-1, in Florence in its only tuneup for the European Championships next month.
snippet: Antonio Di Natale scored twice and Mauro Camoranesi had a goal to lead host Italy, the World Cup champion, over Belgium, 3-1, in Florence in its only tuneup for the European Championships next month.
